input_text:
Job Title: Solution Developer/Power Platform Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Oak Technologies, Inc., is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Hi,

Hope you doing great!

This is Manoj from Oak Technologies INC.

We have a job position for Solutions Developer/Power Platform Developer for long term contract assignment.

Position: Solutions Developer/Power Platform Developer

Location:  Remote

Duration:  Long Term Contract

Job Description:

Develop, test, support and deploy SharePoint Online and Power Platform solutions that meet end user requirements.Develop, test, support Power BI reports/dashboards.Automate team controls using Power Platform solutions.Responsible for applying business and technical knowledge to ensure availability of our systems, and to provide quality solutions for business areaPerform lead developer role to complete high-level and technical automation design existing and new processes.Provide technical leadership and complete complex system level assignments.Provide guidance and training to less experienced developers on the business impact of the systems supported and the technical design of systems.Develop business and technical requirements for enhancements projects.Design, develop, test, document, and implement solutions within targeted due dates.Provide and validate program / task / system estimates.Proactively identify implications of a project articulate urgency, dependencies, and trade-offs over multiple systems.Lead walkthroughs to assure quality of applications developed by other associates. Walkthroughs are done with an overall perspective to ensure quality and follow firm standards.Develop relationships with stakeholders.Identify opportunities to modify software to avoid future problems and promote continuous improvement.Develop and execute complex system test plans to ensure quality.Create documentation across many systems and functional areas that describes touch points and impacts at a total system level.

Project Details:

 Developer will gain knowledge of Edward Jones compensation programs and the processes used to support these programs. Enhancing these processes will provide significant time savings. Developer will train and upskill less experienced developers, which will result in quicker turnaround/faster realized time savings for solutions/projects from these developers.Developer will build relationships with other stakeholders within Edward Jones

Required Qualifications:

Minimum of 5 years experience developing Power Platform solutions.Advanced knowledge of multiple technologies including:Microsoft Power AppsMicrosoft Power AutomateMicrosoft Power BI
Preferred Qualifications:  Experience in developing processes that support compensation.

Solution Developer/Power Platform Developer

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Solutions Developer/Power Platform Developer
job_responsibilities: Develop, test, support and deploy SharePoint Online and Power Platform solutions.
Develop, test, support Power BI reports/dashboards.
Automate team controls using Power Platform solutions.
Responsible for applying business and technical knowledge to ensure availability of systems.
Provide quality solutions for business areas.
Lead developer role to complete high-level and technical automation design.
Provide technical leadership and complete complex system level assignments.
Provide guidance and training to less experienced developers.
Develop business and technical requirements for enhancements projects.
Design, develop, test, document, and implement solutions within targeted due dates.
Proactively identify implications of a project and articulate urgency, dependencies, and trade-offs.
Lead walkthroughs to assure quality of applications developed by other associates.
Identify opportunities to modify software to avoid future problems.
Develop and execute complex system test plans.
Create documentation across many systems and functional areas.

other.content: Develop, test, support and deploy SharePoint Online and Power Platform solutions that meet end user requirements. Develop, test, support Power BI reports/dashboards. Automate team controls using Power Platform solutions. Responsible for applying business and technical knowledge to ensure availability of our systems, and to provide quality solutions for business area. Perform lead developer role to complete high-level and technical automation design existing and new processes. Provide technical leadership and complete complex system level assignments. Provide guidance and training to less experienced developers on the business impact of the systems supported and the technical design of systems. Develop business and technical requirements for enhancements projects. Design, develop, test, document, and implement solutions within targeted due dates. Proactively identify implications of a project articulate urgency, dependencies, and trade-offs over multiple systems. Lead walkthroughs to assure quality of applications developed by other associates. Walkthroughs are done with an overall perspective to ensure quality and follow firm standards. Develop relationships with stakeholders. Identify opportunities to modify software to avoid future problems and promote continuous improvement. Develop and execute complex system test plans to ensure quality. Create documentation across many systems and functional areas that describes touch points and impacts at a total system level.

Developer will gain knowledge of Edward Jones compensation programs and the processes used to support these programs. Enhancing these processes will provide significant time savings. Developer will train and upskill less experienced developers, which will result in quicker turnaround/faster realized time savings for solutions/projects from these developers. Developer will build relationships with other stakeholders within Edward Jones
